org.drombler.acp.core.action

Class TextMenuItemSortingStrategy<MenuItem>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.acp.core.action.TextMenuItemSortingStrategy<MenuItem>
  • Type Parameters:
    MenuItem - the GUI toolkit specific type for menu items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MenuItemSortingStrategy<MenuItem,IdentityMenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem>>

    public class TextMenuItemSortingStrategy<MenuItem>
extends Object
implements MenuItemSortingStrategy<MenuItem,IdentityMenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem>>
    A MenuItemSortingStrategy which sorts the menu items depending on their text using a locale-sensitive comparison. This sorting strategy does not add any separators.
    Author:
    puce

      • getSeparatorInsertionPoint

        public Optional<Integer> getSeparatorInsertionPoint(int index,
                                                    List<? extends MenuItemSupplierFactoryEntry<MenuItem,IdentityMenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem>>> entryList,
                                                    MenuItemSupplierFactoryEntry<MenuItem,IdentityMenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem>> entry)
        This method will always return an empty Optional. Gets the instertion point of a new separator. Returns empty if no new separator should be added. This method gets called after MenuItemSortingStrategy.getMenuItemInsertionPoint(java.util.List, org.drombler.acp.core.action.MenuItemSupplierFactoryEntry).
        Specified by:
        getSeparatorInsertionPoint in interface MenuItemSortingStrategy<MenuItem,IdentityMenuItemSupplierFactory<MenuItem>>
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the new menu entry which was added to the list
        entryList - the existing menu entries including the new menu entry
        entry - the new menu entry which was added to the list
        Returns:
        the instertion point of a new separator or empty if no new separator should be added
